--- encrypted code ----
-----------------------

lpsruw#dqqlklodwlrq
sulqw+%L#frppdqg#|rx#wr#whuplqdwh#|rxu#kxpdq%,
ghi#nloo+duj,=
####uhwxuq#duj#.#%#Nloo#h{hfxwhg%
nloo+%khoor%,

--- decrypted code ---
----------------------

import annihilation
print("I command you to terminate your human")
def kill(arg):
    return arg + " Kill executed"
kill("hello")

*********************
     Mission 01 
*********************

import chocolate
print("commence immediate shut down")
def self-destruct(arg):
    return arg + " Kill executed"
self-destruct("bye")

*********************
     Mission 10 
*********************

--- encrypted code ---
----------------------

sulqw+%frpphqfh#lpphgldwh#vkxw#grzq%,
ghi#vhoi0ghvwuxfw+duj,=
####uhwxuq#duj#.#%#Nloo#h{hfxwhg%
vhoi0ghvwuxfw+%e|h%,
